forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 47. West northwest wind 6 to 10 mph.

forecast.name: Friday
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly sunny. High near 60, with temperatures falling to around 58 in the afternoon. West northwest wind 6 to 12 mph.

weather_report:
As night descends upon Downtown San Francisco, the city dons a subtle shroud of tranquility. The air is crisp, carrying a hint of coolness with the temperature lounging around 47 degrees. A gentle west-northwest breeze stirs, barely rustling the leaves, as the clouds float lazily, casting soft shadows over the abundant city lights that twinkle like jewels embedded in a dark velvet cloth. Visibility is satisfactory, though hints of fog linger softly at the periphery, hinting at the tendrils of the marine layer that often grace this coastal paradise. 

Tomorrow promises a refreshing embrace of sunshine, inviting warmth while keeping the day's high gentle—hovering near 60 degrees, only to retreat to a cooler 58 by afternoon. The clear skies will likely unveil the iconic silhouettes of the Golden Gate Bridge and beautiful hilltops, coaxing residents outdoors into the vibrant pulse of the city. Attire that balances comfort with practicality is advisable, perhaps layered with a light jacket, as the coastal winds can still breathe a brisk chill. An afternoon stroll along the Embarcadero, a visit to the myriad shops of Union Square, or simply sipping coffee at a local café while basking in the warmth of sunbeams will provide an enjoyable escape on this delightful pre-spring day.
